typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedPricePointCode@ValidPricePointCode select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Price_Point_Code)) && trim(Price_Point_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedPricePointCode@(ValidPricePointCode, InvalidPricePointCode)
InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidPricePointCode
ValidatedPricePointCode@InvalidPricePointCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Price Pint Code")) ~> InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidPricePointCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
